full_tashahhud_phonetic:
At-tahiyyÄtu lillÄhi was-salawÄtu wat-tayyibÄt, as-salÄmu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa rahmatu llÄhi wa barakÄtuh, as-salÄmu 'alaynÄ wa 'alÄ 'ibÄdil-lÄhis-sÄliá¸¥Ä«n, ashhadu an lÄ ilÄha illÄ llÄh wa ashhadu anna Muá¸¥ammadan 'abduhu wa rasÅ«luh.

AllÄhumma á¹£alli 'alÄ muá¸¥ammad wa 'alÄ Äli muá¸¥ammad kamÄ á¹£allayta 'alÄ ibrÄhÄ«m wa 'alÄ Äli ibrÄhÄ«m innaka á¸¥amÄ«dun majÄ«d. AllÄhumma bÄrik 'alÄ muá¸¥ammad wa 'alÄ Äli muá¸¥ammad kamÄ bÄrakta 'alÄ ibrÄhÄ«m wa 'alÄ Äli ibrÄhÄ«m innaka á¸¥amÄ«dun majÄ«d.

AllÄhumma innÄ« a'Å«dhu bika min 'adhÄbi jahannam, wa min 'adhÄbil-qabr, wa min fitnatil-maá¸¥yÄ wal-mamÄt, wa min sharri fitnatil-masÄ«á¸¥id-dajjÄl.
full_tashahhud_translation:
All greetings, prayers and good things belong to Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, as well as the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity except Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

O Allah, pray upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad as You prayed upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim. You are indeed Worthy of praise and glorification. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are indeed Worthy of praise and glorification.

O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the false Messiah (al-MasÄ«á¸¥ ad-DajjÄl).
salam_translation: May peace and mercy of Allah be upon you

tashahhud_phonetic: At-taá¸¥iyyÄtu lillÄh, waá¹£-á¹£alawÄtu waá¹­-á¹­ayyibÄt. As-salÄmu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa raá¸¥matullÄhi wa barakÄtuh. As-salÄmu 'alaynÄ wa 'alÄ 'ibÄdillÄhiá¹£-á¹£Äliá¸¥Ä«n. Ash-hadu allÄ ilÄha illa AllÄh, wa ash-hadu anna Muá¸¥ammadan 'abduhu wa rasÅ«luh.

Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity except Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.
